effect_entries.effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
味方に　道具を
渡せるように　なる。

The Pokémon can pass
an item to an ally.

Il Pokémon può passare il suo
strumento a un alleato.

El Pokémon puede pasar su
objeto a un aliado.

Das Pokémon kann sein Item an
einen Mitstreiter weitergeben.

Permet aux alliés d’utiliser
l’objet porté par ce Pokémon.

같은 편에게 도구를
건넬 수 있게 된다.

みかたに　どうぐを
わたせるように　なる。
